page_content:
CORPORATE RESPONSIBILITY AT ANSYS  5
Innovation, inclusiveness, transparency and integrity 
are key components of ANSYS’ culture and values . 
Building high-quality, innovative products is the core 
of our business, and we are committed to creating 
sustainable, long-term value for our key stakeholders: 
our investors, customers, employees and partners. We 
are also responsible for sustaining and improving the 
environment in which we function.We are committed to having a positive impact on the lives 
of people and improving the sustainability of the planet 
through our products and practices.Our Approach
Our Approach
